item.title: About us
item.description: Who are we? LegoGoa is a Goa based organization that helps young minds to learn various STEM concepts like programming and computer-aided design through the means of LEGO and robotics. While we are very dedicated towards robotics and LEGO, we place a special emphasis on generating awareness and conducting LEGO and other STEM based outreach towards the disadvantaged members of our community as well as towards the public. Achievements of LegoGoa LegoGoa has participated in various competition such as First Lego League, MakeX India, World Robotics Olympiad ,International MIT App Inventor Competition We have won Inspirational team award for First Lego League 2018 an First place in MakeX India 2020 Additionally , one of our members secured the 11th Rank at India World Robot Olympiad and another two of our members has have won the National level ‘Google Code To Learn Contest‚Äô Team LegoGoa has secured the third place for People’s Choice awards for our VOX app designed for 2021 MIT App inventor Appathon for Good Another one of our students has got Top Student Ambassador Award in Codeavour 2020 AI Coding Competition üë®üèΩ‚ÄçüíªTeam Members These are all the people in our team.

item.title: Credits
item.description: We are very thankful for the people who help us so this is our way of saying thankyou to them Shri Pramod Sawant, Honourable Chief Minister of Goa for encouragement and support and funding Director, Department of Information and Publicity for providing sponsorship. FTC teams 7506 and 8866, Lovejoy Lane 7074b, Frederick Oklahoma 73542 for donating Rev expansion hub to our team. Shri Veeranjaneyulu Doppalapudi, Shri Vishant Shirodkar, Shankar Karpe and Vianca Verma for carrying FTC parts from USA to India.

item.title: FTC
item.description: What is First ‚Ä¢ FIRST¬Æ (For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology) is a robotics community that prepares young people for the future through a suite of inclusive, team-based robotics programs for ages 4-18 (PreK-12) that can be facilitated in school or in structured afterschool programs. ‚Ä¢ It is boosted by a global support system of volunteers, educators, and sponsors that include over 200 of the Fortune 500 companies, teams operate under a signature set of FIRST Core Values to conduct research, fundraise, design, build, and showcase their achievements during annual challenges.

item.title: Sponsor us
item.description: Participating in a competition of this scale needs considerable funds and resources and we would be grateful to receive help from you in any possible way. ‚Ä¢There are a number of ways that you can help us. We would be deeply thankful to receive: ‚Ä¢Funding for our project (however much you can donate). ‚Ä¢Parts or tools to help us make our robot ‚Ä¢Giving us access to your social media following or connections to allow us to spread the word about our group
